Title: Tenebrael Shard
Legend: A Tenebrael Shard is a killer of superlative skill. Fast beyond belief, supernaturally agile and ominously silent, the Shard closes upon his prey as fast as thought and ends their lives with callous efficiency. None know whether he is an assassin, a spy, or simply a terrifying force of nature, but to stand in his path means certain death.
Intro: A Tenebrael Shard is armed with Bladed Barbs and Reaper Gauntlets.

Rules.Name: Shadowstrike
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES In your hero phase, you can roll a dice for this unit. If you do so, on a 4+, you can remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is within 3" of any enemy units. If you do so, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit until the end of the turn.

Rules.Name: Graceful Killer
Rules.Rule: Ignore Rend modifiers to save rolls for attacks that target this unit.

Rules.Name: Incredible Speed
Rules.Rule: At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this modelâ€™s attacks in that phase, this model can move up to 8" but cannot finish that move within 3" of an enemy unit.
